data.title: Best Movies Like The Lost Legion
meta_keywords: movies similar to The Lost Legion
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to The Lost Legion: The First King (2019), Colosseum (2022), Hero of Rome (1964), Attila (2001), Gladiator (2000), Centurion (2010), Diamond Cartel (2015), Amazons and Gladiators (2001), The Eagle (2011), The Arena (1974)
